CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 15, 1946, pg. 2 reads: "Dies At Seventy-Six - Mrs. Bertha M. Davis, prominent Fifth Ward citizen, died Tuesday at Passavant Hospital after an illness of three months. "Mom," as she was affectionately called by many, was a native of Ontario, Canada, but had been a resident of Pittsburgh for many years.-Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Full length portrait of Bertha M. Davis, wearing belted Red Cross uniform and hat, standing outside of brick building
